extendedInfo.description: In the not too distant future a relic from a past civilization is held prisoner. Ban, the king of the Light is relic number 87 and is contained within a stasis cell under the watchful eyes of Dr. Zimmer. Ban has to escape from this prison to gain his freedom and bring justice to those that imprisoned him.
